game.board.hexes

Class Hex

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.hexes.Hex

  • public class Hex
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a hexagonal board tile.
    Author:
    Cornelia Sedlmeir-Hofmann, Christoph Hermann
